options.content:
- **Use Cases**: This dashboard shows code coverage metrics from Codecov organized by flags.
- **Data Source Required**: Codecov
- **Metrics**: Overall Coverage, Modified Coverage, Methods Coverage, and Coverage Trends per flag

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT c.coverage_percentage FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND c.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo() ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    (SELECT cc.overall_coverage FROM _tool_codecov_commit_coverages cc INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON cc.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND cc.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND cc.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND cc.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo() ORDER BY cc.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1)
  ) as value

SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT c.lines_total FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.lines_total > 0 ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    0
  ) as value

SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT c.hits FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.hits > 0 ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    0
  ) as value

SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (SELECT c.misses FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND c.misses > 0 ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1),
    0
  ) as value

panels.description: Overall coverage trend over time for selected flag

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(c.commit_timestamp) as time_sec,
  c.coverage_percentage as value
FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c
INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
  AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
  AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
  AND c.coverage_percentage > 0
  AND c.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
  AND c.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp

panels.title: Overall Coverage Trend

panels.description: Coverage trend over selected time period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE(
    (
      SELECT 
        (end_coverage - start_coverage) as trend
      FROM (
        SELECT 
          (SELECT c.coverage_percentage FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND (c.branch = 'main' OR c.branch = 'master') AND c.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND c.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo() ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp ASC LIMIT 1) as start_coverage,
          (SELECT c.coverage_percentage FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}' AND (c.branch = 'main' OR c.branch = 'master') AND c.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND c.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo() ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1) as end_coverage
      ) as coverage_data
      WHERE start_coverage IS NOT NULL AND end_coverage IS NOT NULL
    ),
    (
      SELECT 
        (end_coverage - start_coverage) as trend
      FROM (
        SELECT 
          (SELECT cc.overall_coverage FROM _tool_codecov_commit_coverages cc INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON cc.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND cc.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND (cc.branch = 'main' OR cc.branch = 'master') AND cc.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND cc.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo() ORDER BY cc.commit_timestamp ASC LIMIT 1) as start_coverage,
          (SELECT cc.overall_coverage FROM _tool_codecov_commit_coverages cc INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON cc.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND cc.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND (cc.branch = 'main' OR cc.branch = 'master') AND cc.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom() AND cc.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo() ORDER BY cc.commit_timestamp DESC LIMIT 1) as end_coverage
      ) as coverage_data
      WHERE start_coverage IS NOT NULL AND end_coverage IS NOT NULL
    ),
    0
  ) as value

panels.title: Coverage Trend

panels.description: Lines coverage over time for selected flag

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(c.commit_timestamp) as time_sec,
  c.lines_covered as 'Lines Covered',
  c.lines_total as 'Lines Total'
FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c
INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
  AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
  AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
  AND c.lines_total > 0
  AND c.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
  AND c.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY c.commit_timestamp

panels.title: Lines Coverage Trend

panels.description: Daily aggregated coverage trend from coverage_trends table

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(c.commit_timestamp)) as time_sec,
  AVG(c.coverage_percentage) as value
FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c
INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
  AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
  AND c.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
  AND c.coverage_percentage > 0
  AND c.commit_timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
  AND c.commit_timestamp <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY DATE(c.commit_timestamp), UNIX_TIMESTAMP(DATE(c.commit_timestamp))
ORDER BY DATE(c.commit_timestamp)

panels.title: Daily Coverage Trend (Aggregated)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  fc.file_path as 'File Path',
  CONCAT(ROUND(fc.coverage_percentage, 2), '%') as 'Coverage %',
  fc.lines_covered as 'Lines Covered',
  fc.lines_total as 'Lines Total',
  fc.lines_missed as 'Lines Missed',
  fc.hits as 'Hits',
  fc.misses as 'Misses',
  fc.partials as 'Partials'
FROM _tool_codecov_file_coverages fc
INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON fc.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
INNER JOIN (
  SELECT fcl.commit_sha
  FROM _tool_codecov_file_coverages fcl
  INNER JOIN project_mapping pml ON fcl.repo_id = pml.row_id AND pml.table = '_tool_codecov_repos'
  WHERE pml.project_name = '${project}'
    AND fcl.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
    AND fcl.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
  ORDER BY fcl.commit_timestamp DESC
  LIMIT 1
) latest ON fc.commit_sha = latest.commit_sha
WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}'
  AND fc.repo_id = '${repo_id}'
  AND fc.flag_name = '${flag_name}'
ORDER BY fc.coverage_percentage ASC, fc.file_path
LIMIT 100

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM projects ORDER BY name LIMIT 1
list.label: Project
list.name: project
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM projects ORDER BY name

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT c.repo_id FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' ORDER BY c.repo_id LIMIT 1
list.label: Repository
list.name: repo_id
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.repo_id FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' ORDER BY c.repo_id

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT c.flag_name FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name != '' AND c.flag_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.flag_name LIMIT 1
list.label: Test Name
list.name: flag_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.flag_name FROM _tool_codecov_coverages c INNER JOIN project_mapping pm ON c.repo_id = pm.row_id AND pm.table = '_tool_codecov_repos' WHERE pm.project_name = '${project}' AND c.repo_id = '${repo_id}' AND c.flag_name != '' AND c.flag_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY c.flag_name
